Topic.Title: My friends and I are uneducated liberal hicks

Message.Msg: The whole country noticed it and was repulsed.

Message.Title: Barrasso schools the empty suit
Message.Msg: As a doctor, I can tell you the presidentâ€™s essentially ignored the major issues of mental health and violence in society in the media and video games and he has focused so much on what may be happening at gun shows or on gun shelves and gun stores that I think he is failing to really try to find a solution to the problem of the tragedy of Newtown.

Sorry, you lost, the court has decided that the 2nd amendment is about an individuals right to bear arms. But lets look at the dissenting opinion for that court, the right to keep and bear arms" protects only a right to possess and use firearms in connection with service in a state-organized militia" Really?, the founders felt they had to protect the rights of people in a state run military militia to bear arms, that's your argument? Really?

Neither. "Comprehensive health care" is already in the books. And it is silent about the issue. Obama owns it 100%. Videos are protected by 1st amendment, but president wouldn't lift a finger to wag on his Hollywood friends. Barrasso only points out that president's executive orders are off target. Not to mention that executive orders designed to be addressed to executive branch only. So, our dear leader oversteps constitutional boundaries. by imposing them on regular citizens. Never mind, no one outside executive branch violates the law by disobeying executive order.

Topic.Title: My friends and I are uneducated liberal hicks

Message.Msg: not to worry, you libs have 4 more years of handouts. As far as Michelle, google an image of Patrick Ewing and tell me they don't look alike.

Message.Title: The Shooting In Texas Was Minority And Gang-Related

Topic.Title: The Shooting In Texas Was Minority And Gang-Related

Message.Msg: They must raise the price of firearms so that the violent lower classes cannot afford them. $500 for a revolver and $600 for a generic semi-auto pistol should do it. Oh, wait....

Topic.Title: The Shooting In Texas Was Minority And Gang-Related

Message.Msg: Actually the semi-auto's they use cost considerably LESS than $600. The cheapest, the Raven, is about $70. As far as revolvers go, about the cheapest made today are over $200 anyway, you see making revolvers that actually work is HARDER than making a cheap blow back operated semi-automatic, a device I could create from scrap material in a workshop at almost any High School.

Topic.Title: The Shooting In Texas Was Minority And Gang-Related

Message.Msg: $70? $200? That is more than birth control and a cell phone! The less fortunate are being denied access to protection for themselves and their childrens. How is he going to wordsmith an Affordable Universal Protection Act? Wait for it. It is coming. We need to start with a few stories of victims....
Reports are Hillary is looking to trash out and rob the WH again. There was a few things her and Bubba didn't vandalize or steal on their way out last time.

Topic.Title: The Shooting In Texas Was Minority And Gang-Related

Message.Msg: Oh that's already started, he just has to wait for the "right" victims. The wrong victims, like the guy who got shot trying to rob a local bodega and other such "citizens saving their own rears" stories you're NOT going to hear even though the NRA publishes the top 12 or so such incidents each month in The American Rifleman. That's not the "right" message. In fact if you do the victim math right you could even argue that firearms in general are a Darwinian tool as they weed at those too stupid to know how to operate one and those too stupid to run away from them when they don't have one of their own (or even sometimes even if they do, but really can't hit the broad side of a barn).

Is America getting ready to elect a failed comedian, failed talk show host, no brain, no single original idea to be a Commander in Cheif? Nothing really makes sense anymore. This kinda reminds Germany in 1933. Well, Germans today are ashamed to talk about this period in their history. What else is new?
